text: ethakota me winimaya sanchithaya yodaganne yam widiyakin api bhandayak aanayanaya karanawanam ho wahanayak aanayanaya karanawanam adala widesha samagamata gewanne rupiyal walin nemeyi dolar walin, ethakota wishala pirisakata wahana genwimata awasara denawa kiyanne apata mulinma wishala wedesha winimayak wayawana athara eewa sadana petral walata eeta wadi winimayak gewimata siduweyi.
juli 11 udasana 8 : 13

mamath kihipa sarayak thalapa kala thiyenawa habayi mathak hatiyata wadiyenma raha thalapa kawe monaragala hari ampare hari kale mada wadiyaka gagak ayine mas ( polisiyata kiyanna epa) ekka kapu eka thama.thalapa nikam kanawanam melo rahak na.ookata mas hoddakma onelu hodatama desa banna.

siyalu parshwayange ekangathawayen janamadhya aachara dharma paddhathiyak hadayi mahinda chinthana idiri dakma anuwa wadath yahapath ha diyunu janamadhya sanskruthiyak shri lankawa thula athi kirime abhilashaya sakshath karaganu pinisa janamadhya aacharadharma paddhathiyak kshethraye niyali siyalu parshwayange ekangathawen sakas kirime mulika katayuthu janamadhya ha prawruththi amathyanshaya wisin aarambha kara athayi amathyansha lekam charitha herath mahatha sandahan karayi.

thamange samiya miyagos, thun masak pirennatath kalin, diyaniyan nathi thamanta diyaniyakawu, emenma thama dewani puthage birinda, mese akal maranayakata goduruwima, mage loku akka daraganne kelesakada yanna, mata sithagatha nohakiya.
meka thamayi jeppange eeda wela deshapalanaya kiyala kiyanne.

yam palath palana aayathanayaka yam pa්rashnayak athnam masikaraswena pa්radeshiya sanwardhana kamituwe di ho apawa munagasi ho siya pa්rashna eksath janatha nidahas sandhanayata danum dimata hakiyawa thibenawa.mema awasthawata mudal ha kramasampadana niyojya amathya githanjana gunawardhana,basnahira palath sabha manthri renuka perera,palath sabha manthrini ashoka lankathilaka yana mahathma mahathmihu athulu pirisakda sahabhagiwuha.

weda maththayage kathawata math ekayi.ethakota danata thiyana godak prashna aduweyi.hiru asarana lamayi amuthuwen polabawanna oona wenne na.awashya thawata wada sewa sapayanna oona tharam kattiya bihiwenawa,sewa wadiwima thulin illuma adu wenawa.tika kalakin meka samanya deyak bawata pathweyi.hanfon,durakathana samagam wage wikuna ganna passen eyi.kese namuth wagakiwa yuthu aayathana,sawukya sewa mewa niyamaya kala yuthuwe.kochchara nithi dammath mema sewaya nawathwiya nohakiya.meya minisage mulika awashyathawayaki.

nirnamika mahaththayo mata hitha ganna ba obathuma kiyana widiyata me lipiyen indiyawata kade yanne kohomada.dan wicharaka mahaththaya apita arinna hadana indiyawata lipiyakin kade yanawa nam deyiyane obathumata sadacharathmaka ayithiyak na ne pare bas ekakawath yanna.eewath indiyawen ne gennanne.thawa motar bayisikal.nirnamika mahaththayo paudgalika tharahawal podu nyaya pathrayakata obanna gihin nikan sawuththu wenna epa.wicharaka mahaththaya me miyagiya manussayata kamathiyi.ee ohuge rasawindanaya.eekata apahasa karanna obathumata kisima ayithiyak na.baya wenna epa lankawe naluwek marunama wicharaka mahaththaya eekatath lipiyak liyawi.okkoma paththakin thiyanna.apita arinna hadana amerikawe film bala bala , un dena sewawan bhawitha karakara nirnamika mahaththayo obathuma me karanne mona lajja nathi wadakda?
